# Composable Kernel supported operations
## Supported device operations
* [Average pooling]()
* [Batched contraction]()
* [Batched gemm]()
* [Batchnorm]()
* [CGEMM]()
* [Contraction]()
* [Convolution]()
* [Image to Column and Column to Image]()
* [Elementwise]()
* [GEMM]()
* [Max pooling]()
* [Reduce]()
* [Normalization]()
* [Permute]()
* [Put]()
* [Softmax]()
